subject: Can't afford medications you need?
body:
Dear valued member.
MyCanadianPharmacy provides a wide range of pharmaceutical products. You will be surprised by the selection of products available. 
MyCanadianPharmacy on-line drug store provides quality pharmaceutical products to help you manage your health and well-being without spending heaps of money.
Check it out nowhttp://majoryet.hk
Secure online ordering process serves to guarantee high level of confidentiality.
Sincerely yours,France Christian
